content.text: Relative layouts allow you to position UI elements relative to each other or to the parent container.  This offers flexibility in creating complex layouts.
For better performance and tooling support, consider using ConstraintLayout instead of RelativeLayout.

You can specify positions using properties like `android:layout_below`, `android:layout_toRightOf`, `android:layout_alignParentTop`, etc.  Refer to the `RelativeLayout.LayoutParams` documentation for a complete list.

content.alt: Example of a horizontal linear layout with buttons

content.code:
<RelativeLayout
  android:layout_width="match_parent"
  android:layout_height="match_parent"
  xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
  xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto">
  <com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView
    style="@style/Widget.Material3.CardView.Elevated"
    android:id="@+id/card_view"
    android:layout_width="wrap_content"
    android:layout_height="wrap_content"
    android:layout_centerHorizontal="true"
    app:cardCornerRadius="24dp">
    <androidx.appcompat.widget.AppCompatImageView
      android:id="@+id/image_view"
      android:layout_width="wrap_content"
      android:layout_height="wrap_content"
      android:importantForAccessibility="no"
      android:src="@drawable/im_image_view"/>
  </com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView>
  <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
    android:layout_width="wrap_content"
    android:layout_height="wrap_content"
    android:text="@string/button"
    android:id="@+id/button_1"
    android:layout_marginTop="24dp"
    android:layout_below="@id/card_view"/>
  <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
    android:layout_width="wrap_content"
    android:layout_height="wrap_content"
    android:text="@string/button"
    android:layout_below="@id/card_view"
    android:layout_marginTop="24dp"
    android:layout_toEndOf="@+id/button_1"/>
  <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
    android:layout_width="wrap_content"
    android:layout_height="wrap_content"
    android:text="@string/button"
    android:layout_below="@id/button_1"/>
  <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
    android:layout_width="wrap_content"
    android:layout_height="wrap_content"
    android:layout_marginTop="24dp"
    android:layout_below="@id/card_view"
    android:layout_alignParentEnd="true"
    android:text="@string/button"/>
</RelativeLayout>
